nodes.text: Heavy Missile Destroyer  (Royal Naboo Security Forces)
The Royal Heavy Missile Destroyer were aquatic repulsorcraft that were used by the Royal Naboo Security Forces as the anti-air units of its aquatic navy.
Heavy Missile Destroyers appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack Clone Campaigns. They may be built by the Naboo faction in multiplayer.
